text: Dwight Lee (September 3, 1945 – December 29, 2016) was an American football running back. He played for the San Francisco 49ers and Atlanta Falcons in 1968 and for the Montreal Alouettes in 1969. He died of liver cancer on December 29, 2016, in Eugene, Oregon at age 71. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:Michigan State Spartans football players Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Montreal Alouettes players
title: Dwight Lee
